content: Joined Nokia Bell Labs as a Network System Intern, I will work on mobility management framework for O-RAN
Awarded Travel Grant to attend CoNEXT'24 at UCLA
Honored to receive travel grant for AraFest at ISU, AMES. Analyzed collected data from Skylark's MIMOs to measure impact of environment variables on 5G services.
Organized masterclass on wireles communication for K-12 high school students under SENGI program at UMASS Amherst
Happy to be selected for the Young Gladiators 2024 workshop at Northeastern University
I Joined Khwarizmi Lab, UMass Amherst as a Graduate Student ðŸŽ“
